Class Maxim.WavetableSynth

All Implemented Interfaces:

Enclosing class:
Maxim
public class Maxim.WavetableSynth
extends Maxim.AudioPlayer

This class can play wavetables and includes an fx chain

Constructor Detail

Maxim.WavetableSynth

public Maxim.WavetableSynth(int size,
                            float sampleRate)
Create a new wavetable synth. Normally, you would not call this. Instead, call createWavetableSynth on a Maxim object.

Parameters:
int - size- the size of the wavetable
float - sampleRate - the system sampleRate
Method Detail

setFrequency

public void setFrequency(float freq)
Set the playback frequency. You might want to use the Maxim.mtof array to look up the frequency for a midi note

Parameters:
float - freq - the frequency

loadWaveForm

public void loadWaveForm(float[] wavetable_)
Set the samples for the wavetable synthesizer

Parameters:
float[] - wavetable_ - the samples to use
